text: By its action under Article 263 TFEU, the applicant, Mr Kevin Azemovič, seeks the annulment and alteration of the decision of the Fourth Board of Appeal of the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) of 23 March 2021 (Case R 889/2020-4) (‘the contested decision’).
label: PER
ORG
DATE

text: The Court Annuls the decision of the Fourth Board of Appeal of the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) of 23 March 2021 (Case R 889/2020-4);
label: ORG
ORG
DATE

text: Dismisses the action as to the remainder;
Orders EUIPO to bear its own costs and to pay those incurred by Mr Kevin Azemovič for the purposes of the present proceedings and for the purposes of the proceedings before the Board of Appeal;
label: ORG
PER
ORG

text: Orders ETA živilska industrija d.o.o. to bear its own costs.
label: ORG
